title: Syrian refugees - major hosting countries worldwide in 2018
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of admitted Syrian refugees in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of admitted Syrian refugees is highest at Country Turkey and lowest at Country Netherlands.
There is a difference of 3590274.0 between the maximum Country Turkey and minimum Country Netherlands.
